description: '''Jungle''' are a British band founded in 2013 by London-based [[musical production|producers]] Josh Lloyd-Watson and Tom McFarland. Jungle have released four studio albums: ''[[Jungle (Jungle album)|Jungle]]'' (2014), which was shortlisted for the [[Mercury Prize]]; ''[[For Ever (Jungle album)|For Ever]]'' (2018); ''[[Loving in Stereo]]'' (2021); and ''[[Volcano (Jungle album)|Volcano]]'' (2023). The first two albums were released through [[XL Recordings]] while the latter two via their independent label Caiola Records. In 2023, having worked as the main musical contributor on ''Loving in Stereo'' and ''Volcano'', and a key performing member of the live group, Lydia Kitto joined as a permanent member.
